attributes.action: Remove all government benefits (Such as unemployment benefit etc..) and re-route the funds to the NHS, Defence and Education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Remove all government benefits (Such as unemployment benefit etc..) and re-route the funds to the NHS, Defence and Education so that new jobs can be created and the individuals claiming employment benefit are given an incentive to go out and work
